pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Interactive Anatomography Widget for 'shiny' // An 'htmlwidget' of the human body that allows you to hide/show and assign colors to 79 different body parts. The 'human' widget is an 'htmlwidget', so it works in Quarto documents, R Markdown documents, or any other HTML medium. It also functions as an input/output widget in a 'shiny' app.
